A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Never has a movie had so much oportunity that had been squandered in every way. Visual effects and action scenes try to cover up for gaping plot holes\, zero character development\, neglect to pre-established lore from previous installments\, and an obvious lack of proof reading. Please learn from your mistakes\, and DO NOT make an obvious money grab again\, because dedicated fans can only tolerate so much and are hanging by a thread.
